title: SmartGym for iOS, watchOS, Mac gets major update with muscle targeting and recovery, personal records, much more
content:
Available across almost all Apple devices, the popular exercise app SmartGym is out today with a big update. Changes and improvements include tracking for muscle fatigue and recovery, tags for routines, Family Sharing, personal records, and much more.

more…
